T02D2997:58b-0: @58b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2997:58b-1: klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis char 'bebs pa'i las byed
T02D2997:58b-2: par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan
T02D2997:58b-3: pas dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bzhengs la /
T02D2997:58b-4: klu gnas pa'i sar sbra phub la klu gzugs dang gtor ma rnams bshams la /
T02D2997:58b-5: gtso bo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mchod la /
T02D2997:58b-6: sgrub pa po bzhi phyogs bzhi nas rgyud stong phrag
T02D2997:58b-7: re klag / gcig gis klu rnams kyi snying po
T02D2997:58b-8: bzla zhing mchod / gcig gis gtor ma dang chu gtor gyi las bya'o //
T02D2997:58b-9: de ltar bya zhing 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
T02D2997:58b-10: gal te nye bar ma phebs na rdo rje rnam
T02D2997:58b-11: 'joms kyi nga rgyal du byas la snying po bsdus
T02D2997:58b-12: pa la stong phrag gsum bzlas te /
T02D2997:58b-13: klu shing sna tshogs pa'i me spar te /
T02D2997:58b-14: dkar chos kyi sbyin sreg bya'o//
T02D2997:59a-0: @59a * // des kyang ma phebs na bdag nyid kyi snying gnas
T02D2997:59a-1: khro chung grangs med pa spros te de dag re
T02D2997:59a-2: re las sprul pa'i khyung grangs med pa spros te
T02D2997:59a-3: / klu rnams kyi mgrin pa nas bzung bas klu de dag rab tu skrag pa las /
T02D2997:59a-4: rab tu skyugs te char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam
T02D2997:59a-5: du 'bab par dmigs te drag shul gyi sbyin sreg
T02D2997:59a-6: byas pas nges par phebs so //
T02D2997:59a-7: klu'i las char dbab pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun zhes bya ba /
